Text_Settings_HelpScreen_Copy: For FAQs and contact information, please visit:
about_mail_sent_copy_debug: You have successfully sent a diagnostic email with information about your device and this app.
about_no_mail_copy_debug: Please ensure that there is an email account associated with this device.
about_reset_app_copy_debug: Are you sure you wish to reset this app?
account_change_email_alert_body: You must have a password to confirm your amended email address.
account_change_email_alert_title: Create a password to amend your email address
account_change_password_header: This will replace the password you use to sign in across The Walt Disney Company, including Disney, ESPN, ABC and others.
account_notify_password: To amend your email, you first need to create a password.
account_subscription_manage: Please manage your subscription preferences by going to https://disneyplus.com/account/.
account_subscription_message: Please manage your subscription preferences by going to http://disneyplus.com/account.
account_subscription_message_apple: Please manage your subscription preferences by going to your iTunes account.
account_subscription_message_google: Please manage your subscription preferences by going to your Google Play account.
account_subscription_message_hulu: You can manage your subscription preferences by going to your Hulu account.
account_subscription_message_verizon: Please manage your Disney+ subscription by going to your Verizon account.
account_subscription_roku_manage: Please manage your subscription preferences by going to your Roku account.
activate_hulu_copy: To complete activation, please go to Hulu and create your account.
autoplay_subcopy: Enabling Autoplay means the next video in a series will play automatically.
billinginfo_copy: Free for ${trial_duration_unit} days, then only ${product_price}/${product_duration}. Cancel before ${trial_duration_expire_unit} to avoid being charged. No commitments. Cancel at any time. By subscribing you are agreeing to the Disney+ Subscriber Agreement.
billinginfo_title: Enjoy Disney+ for free until 12th November
bundle_activate_account_copy: You're currently logged in to Disney+ as ${user_email}. Complete your bundle activation by activating below.
bundle_hulu_success_subcopy: You will receive an email when your ESPN+ account is ready. ${link_1}.
bundle_success_copy: Your account is ready to use on Disney+
bundle_success_subcopy: Access Hulu via ${link_1}. Log in to ESPN+ to start streaming.
cast_copy: Touch to stream videos to your TV
cell_data_usage_save_data_copy: Stream at a lower quality and use less data
change_email_error_unhandled: An error occurred when verifying your password. Please try again.
change_password_error_unhandled: An error occurred when verifying your password. Please try again.
characters_lower_case: a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z
check_email_copy: We need you to verify your email address. We've sent an email to ${user_email} containing a 6-digit code. Please enter it below.
chromecast_not_available: Disney+ is not available on this Chromecast device.
chromecast_ready: Ready to stream from your phone, laptop or tablet.
communication_settings: To manage or delete your full account, visit our ${link_1} website and click on 'My Account'.
communication_settings_prompt: To manage or delete your full Disney account, please visit https://privacychoices.thewaltdisneycompany.com.
complete_promo_subscription_title: You're only one step away from redeeming your offer.
complete_subscription_copy: Please complete your subscription to start watching Disney+.
complete_subscription_title: You're only one step away from streaming.
contact_csr_subtitle: You can access Disney+ customer service by going to help.disneyplus.com
contact_csr_subtitle_au: Disney+ customer service is available for 24 hours a day, every day, on 1800965160
contact_csr_subtitle_ca: Disney+ customer service is available for 24 hours a day, every day, on 888-282-0520
contact_csr_subtitle_nl: Disney+ customer service is available for 24 hours a day, every day, on 0800 022 1476
contact_csr_subtitle_nz: Disney+ customer service is available for 24 hours a day, every day, on 1800447430
contact_csr_subtitle_us: Disney+ customer service is available for 24 hours a day, every day, on 888-905-7888
cookiebanner_copy: We and our partners use cookies and other tracking technologies to process information about you, your devices, and your online behaviour to send you information, to personalise content or advertising on this and other sites, apps, or platforms, and to provide social media features. You can find more information at ${link_1} and manage certain preferences at ${link_2}.
create_another_profile_copy: Add another profile below or select Save Profiles if finished
create_new_password_subtitle: This is the password you'll be using from now on to sign in across The Walt Disney Company, including Disney, ESPN, ABC and others.
create_profile_copy: Add up to seven profiles to personalise your experience or select "Done" if finished.
ctv_activation_generic: Click Allow on your mobile device
d23success_copy: Stay tuned... We'll be in touch as launch day gets closer.
d23success_title: Congratulations on becoming a Disney+ Founder!
delete_profile_copy: Profile history, watchlist and activity will be deleted. This will be permanent.
descriptor_copy_pagenolongeravailable: "[Name of page]" is no longer available. You will be redirected to Disney+ Home
disney_account_copy: With this account, you can access Disney+, Star Wars, Marvel and other Walt Disney Company services.
download_app_apple: Download our iOS App to start streaming
download_app_google: Get our Android App to start streaming
download_device_limit_copy: You have downloads on too many devices. Remove all downloads from a device to free up devices.
download_error_general: Something went wrong. Please try again.
download_fail: Not enough memory. Free up space by removing content.
download_media_missing: Selected content was deleted in System Settings or by the operating system.
download_quality_high_copy: Slowest download and requires the most storage. Approximately ${time} ${unit} of content based on available storage.
download_quality_medium_copy: Faster download and requires less storage. Approximately ${time} ${unit} of content based on available storage.
download_quality_standard_copy: Fastest download and requires the least storage. Approximately ${time} ${unit} of content based on available storage.
download_resume: Your download will automatically resume when you connect to a Wi-Fi network.
download_resume2: Your download will automatically resume when you connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network.
download_season_episodes_batch: Downloading the first ${E} episodes. Select download season again to queue more downloads.
download_season_episodes_size_batch: Downloading the first ${E} episodes (${VALUE}). Select download season again to queue more downloads.
download_space: You may not have enough storage space left to complete this download. Free up space by removing content or lower quality settings to reduce the required storage.
downloads_copy: Movies and series you download will appear here.
downloads_empty_copy: Movies and series you download will appear here.
downloads_hint: Visit Downloads to watch videos offline
email_change_copy: This will replace the email address you use to sign in across The Walt Disney Company, including Disney, ESPN, ABC and others.
email_changed_banner_message: Your email address has successfully been changed.
email_resend_subtitle: Don't forget to check your spam folder. Still can't find it? Visit the Help Centre for help and contact options.
email_resend_subtitle_3: Still can't find it? Check your spam folder.
email_resend_unsuccessful_subtitle: We were unable to send the email. Please try again.
error_addtowatchlist_title: This item could not be added to your watchlist
error_bin_blocked: Before you can subscribe to Disney+, we must verify that you are a resident of the country from where you are signing up. Your payment method must therefore correspond to that country.
error_cd_firmwareupdate_copy: Please check and update your TV's firmware to the latest version for the best viewing experience.
error_chromecast_deprecation: We no longer support 1st generation Chromecast. To set up your Chromecast, please use a 2nd or 3rd generation device.
error_collection_unavailable: Sorry, content you are trying to access is not currently available. You will be redirected to Disney+ Home.
error_duplicate_profile_name: Profile name is already taken. Enter a different name.
error_generic: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
error_genericplaybackfailure: Something went wrong. Please try again. If you continue to have issues, please contact Disney+ Subscription Support. (No error code)
error_medianotallowed_parental-control: This title cannot be accessed because it exceeds your profile's parental controls settings. You will be redirected to Disney+ Home.
error_medianotallowed_stream-concurrency: Your account is playing four videos, the maximum allowed. To watch on this device, please stop playing on another device.
error_mediaunavailable: The requested media is not available. Please try again. If you continue to have problems, please contact Disney+ Subscription Support (error code 41).
error_purchase_refunded: Disney+ is not available in the country associated with your payment info. We've cancelled and refunded your purchase. Please update your payment info and try again.
error_purchase_refunded_guest_blocked: You are not eligible to purchase Disney+. We've cancelled and refunded your purchase. For more info, please visit http://help.disneyplus.com.
error_removefromwatchlist_title: This item could not be removed from your watchlist
error_unsaved_changes_title: Do you want to save your changes?
eup_login_note: Log In is for subscribers in the Netherlands, where Disney+ is currently available. This Log In screen is for portability access.
expiringpaymentmethod_banner: Your payment method is about to expire. To keep your subscription active, update your payment method in Payment Details.
expiringpaymentmethod_banner_title: Your payment method is about to expire
expiringpaymentmethod_billingdetails_ban: Your payment method is about to expire. Update your payment info.
expiringpaymentmethod_copy: To keep your subscription active, update your payment method in Payment Details.
expiringpaymentmethod_title: Your payment method is about to expire
failed_download_season_copy: There seems to be an error. Please try again later.
failed_download_start: Would you like to retry the download?
failedpaymentmethod_banner: Your payment method has failed. To keep your subscription active, update your payment method in Payment Details
failedpaymentmethod_billingdetails_banne: Your payment method has failed. Update your payment info.
failedpaymentmethod_copy: To keep your subscription active, update your payment method in Payment Details.
freetrial_fraud_prevention_copy: This payment method has already been used for a free trial. If you proceed with your purchase, you will be charged immediately.
freetrial_fraud_prevention_title: You are not eligible for a free trial.
homecountrywarn_copy: Disney+ is available in your current location. However, you're using a payment method associated with a country where Disney+ is not yet available. Please note you will not be able to use the service if you return to that country.
interrupt_subscription: Your account and log in information will be retained. Subscribe at any time.
invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
kidsprofile_restrictedsearch: "{$title}" ({$rating}) is not available in this profile.
kidsprofile_restrictedsearch_smallcopy: This title exceeds Kids mode's parental control settings.
kidsprofile_subcopy: Kid-friendly interface, only featuring content suitable for kids.
legal_cd_iap_copy: By selecting the monthly or annual subscription button below, you are signing up for automatic payments of $6.99/mth or $69.99/yr (plus tax where applicable). You can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings. If you don't cancel before the trial ends, you will be charged.
legal_copy: By clicking the monthly button below, you are agreeing to start your subscription immediately, and you will not be able to withdraw from the contract and receive a refund. If you don’t cancel before the trial ends, you will be charged the monthly fee on a recurring basis. You can cancel at any time, effective at the end of the billing period. No refunds or credits will be given for partial months or years.
legal_copy_2: By selecting "Agree & Continue", you are agreeing to our terms of use https://disneytermsofuse.com/, you are agreeing to start your subscription immediately and you will not be able to withdraw from the contract and receive a refund. If you don't cancel before the trial ends, you will be charged the monthly fee and Disney will store your payment details for payment. You can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings.
legal_opt_in_form_subheading: By clicking "Agree & Continue", you are agreeing to and acknowledging that you have read our:
license_expired_fail_title: Failed to renew the content licence
license_expired_renew: Connect to the internet to automatically renew downloaded content.
locked_out_title: You've been locked out due to too many failed log-in attempts
log_in_email_error_no_account: Unknown email. Please check your spelling.
log_in_noaccount: We couldn't find an account for that email
log_in_noaccount_2: We couldn't find an account with that email address. Try again.
log_in_preexisting_account_2: You already have an account from ESPN+, Star Wars, Marvel, ABC or another Disney service. We'll use this account to proceed with your purchase of Disney+.
log_in_title: Log in with your email address
log_out_confirmation_copy: Logging out will remove all downloaded content from this device.
log_out_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
loggedoutnavigation: No ads. Start for free. Cancel at any time.
marketing_opt_in_form_subheading: Please take a moment to review.
media_player_fetch_failure: A problem occurred while starting the player.
mobile_prompt_copy: ${DEVICE_NAME} has requested your authorisation to log in.
network_error_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
network_error_message_noretry: Please check your internet connection. We will automatically reload the screen once a connection is established.
no_search_results_copy: Please try searching by a series name, movie, actor or character.
offline_copy: There was a problem loading data for this view. Connect to the internet and try again.
offline_helper_tooltip: Visit Downloads to watch videos offline
password_changed_banner_message: Your password has successfully been changed
password_create_password_banner_message: Your password has successfully been created.
password_reqs: Use a minimum of 6 characters (case sensitive) with at least one number or special character
payment_error_copy: Please check your payment info and try again. If the problem persists, call
payment_error_title: There was an error processing your payment.
paymentcountryterms_title: Accept your payment country terms to complete your purchase
paywall_copy: Explore thousands of titles from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic and more.
paywall_copy_2: No ads. Cancel at any time.
paywall_mobile_link: Use a mobile device that's connected to the same network, open the Disney+ app and we'll take it from there.
pcon_copy_1: Select a profile to enable Kids mode.
pcon_copy_2: Kids mode will only show content suitable for ages 6 and below.
postplay_playondevice: Press "Play" on your device to start
primaryprofileexplainer: This is your primary profile. It cannot be deleted or set to a Kid's profile.
profile_copy: Enjoying Disney+ with others? Set up personal profiles, or even a family profile for movie night.
promo_existing_sub_stacking_billing: Your account has an active promotion. Action may be required if you have duplicate subscriptions. For assistance, visit our ${link_1} or refer to previously sent email.
ready_to_cast_title: Ready to stream videos from this app

restart_copy: Your ${days} -day free trial has ended. You will be charged immediately. No ads. Cancel at any time.
restart_sub: Welcome back, it seems like you're not subscribed.
restart_sub_2: Did you cancel or let your subscription end?
restart_sub_3: Previously purchased and still have an active subscription through iTunes? [Restore purchase]
restart_subscription_cddirect_legal_copy: By selecting "Agree & Continue", you are signing up for automatic payments, you are agreeing to start your subscription immediately and you will not be able to withdraw from the contract and receive a refund. You can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings.
restart_subscription_web_legal_copy: By clicking "Agree & Continue", you are signing up for automatic payments, you are agreeing to start your subscription immediately and you will not be able to withdraw from the contract and receive a refund. You can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings.

save_payment_disneyrewards: Use Disney Rewards Redemption across the Walt Disney Family of Companies.

save_payment_paypal: Use PayPal across the Walt Disney Family of Companies.
search_placeholder: Search by title, character, or genre

server_error_message: There seems to be an issue connecting to the Disney+ service. Please try again later if the issue persists.
service_unavailable_subtitle: Disney+ is unavailable in your location. Go to help.disneyplus.com to learn more.
set_up_profiles_copy: By setting up profiles, each person can watch according to their preferences.
settings_background_video_subcopy: Enabling background videos means videos will play in the background of landing pages throughout the app.
settings_faq:
For FAQs and contact information, please visit:
help.disneyplus.com
settings_helpscreen_copy: For FAQs and contact information, please visit:
sign_up_on_web: To subscribe to Disney+, go to http://disneyplus.com/${platform} on your internet browser.
signup_existing_user_copy:
${email} has previously been used to sign up for Disney+, Star Wars, Marvel or another Disney service.
Enter the password you use with this email address to log in and continue.
signup_existing_user_copy_2: Enter the password you use with this email address to log in and continue.
signup_legal_disclaimer: By subscribing, you are agreeing to the Disney+ terms of use: disneyplus.com/terms
signup_new_user: Free for ${trial_duration_unit} days, then only ${product_price}/${product_duration}. Cancel at any time.
single_sign_on_instructions: Use your Disney Streaming Services email address and password to access the app. This is the same email and password combination used to sign in to your Disney Streaming Services email.
starz_tagline: Obsessable™ original series like Power and Outlander and thousands of hit movies to watch whenever, wherever.
stillwatching_question: Would you like to keep watching?
store_app_rating: We're pleased to hear that! Would you mind taking a minute to write a review in the app store?
store_support_request: Sorry to hear that. Would you like to send us feedback on how we can make Disney+ better?
stream_concurrency_error: Too many streams are being played using the same account.
stream_concurrency_error_too_many_videos: Your account is currently playing too many videos. To watch ${program_title}, please stop playing on another device.
subscribe_copy:
After the trial, ${PRICE}/${TIME_UNIT}. Cancel at any time.
Cancel before ${CANCEL_BEFORE_DATE} to avoid being charged.
subscribe_expired_copy:
Your ${trial_duration_unit} day free trial has ended.
You will be charged ${product_price}/${product_duration} starting today. Cancel at any time.
subscriber_agreement: OFFICIAL COPY THAT WILL BE PROVIDED BY LEGAL
success_copy: You are now subscribed to Disney+.
switch_annual_confirmation_copy: Switch to an annual subscription for ${PRICE}/${DURATION}. The changes will take effect on ${DATE}.
switch_annual_confirmation_date: Your annual subscription starts on ${DATE}. You will be charged immediately.
switch_annual_confirmation_legal: By clicking "Agree & Switch", you are signing up for automatic payments. You can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings. For more details, see the terms of use.
switch_monthly_confirmation_copy: Switch to a monthly subscription for ${PRICE}/${DURATION}. The changes will take effect on ${DATE}.
switch_monthly_confirmation_date: Your monthly subscription starts on ${DATE}. You will be charged immediately.
terms_copy:
The following conditions apply:
• Access Disney+ for ${PRICE}/month or ${PRICE}/year. You will automatically be charged for the full amount of your subscription every 30 days.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase, unless you are offered, and are eligible for, a free trial. If you receive a free trial, you will be charged when your free trial period ends. Your account will be charged for renewal within the 24 hours preceding the end of the current period. If you cancel before this 24 hour period, you will not be charged for the following applicable subscription period.

• You can manage your subscription, and turn off auto-renewal, by going to your iTunes Account settings after purchase.

• No refunds will be given for the current subscription period. Cancellations of the current subscription take effect at the end of the current subscription period.
terms_copy_2:
The following conditions apply:
• Access Disney+ for ${price}/month. You will automatically be charged for the full amount of your subscription every 30 days.

• Payment will be charged to your [IAP Store e.g. iTunes] account at confirmation of purchase, unless you are offered, and are eligible for, a free trial. If you receive a free trial, you will be charged when your free trial period ends. Your account will be charged for renewal within the 24 hours preceding the end of the current period. If you cancel before this 24-hour period, you will not be charged for the following applicable subscription period.

• You can manage your subscription, and turn off auto-renewal, by going to your [IAP Store e.g. iTunes] account settings after purchase.

• No refunds will be given for the current subscription period. Cancellations of the current subscription take effect at the end of the current subscription period.
ui_language_copy: Selecting a language below will change the app language for this profile.
unauth_brand_disney: Watch your favorites from Disney, plus the best of Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
unauth_brand_marvel: Watch your favorites from Marvel, plus the best of Disney, Pixar, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
unauth_brand_natgeo: Watch your favorites from National Geographic, plus the best of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, and Star Wars.
unauth_brand_pixar: Watch your favorites from Pixar, plus the best of Disney, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
unauth_brand_starwars: Watch your favorites from Star Wars, plus the best of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, and National Geographic.
unauthdetail_modal_copy: Watch ${title} with a free trial and explore thousands of titles from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic.
unsupported_device_title: You are currently using an unsupported device.
unsupported_device_title_copy: Please check the list of supported devices ${supported_device_url} so you can fully access Disney+.
unsupportedbrowser_banner: You are using an unsupported browser. For the best Disney+ experience, use the latest version of ${link_1}, ${link_2}, ${link_3} or ${link_4}.
update_app_body: Disney+ has a new version. Please update the app by visiting the store.
upgrade_instructions: Disney+ has a new version. Please update the app by visiting the store.
verify_account_banner: Your account needs to be verified.
watchlist_subcopy: Content you add to your watchlist will appear here.
welcome_copy_2: Free for ${trial_duration} days, then only ${price}/month. No ads. Cancel at any time.
welcome_sign_up_web: To sign up for Disney+, please visit http://disneyplus.com.
welcome_subcta_copy: Once your free trial expires, we'll charge your account ${PRICE}/${TIME_UNIT}.
welcome_tagline_copy: No ads. Unlimited downloads. Cancel at any time.
wifi_required: Visit App Settings to change your download preferences.
wifi_required_queue: Queue download until you connect to Wi-Fi. Or visit App Settings to change your download preferences.
wifi_streaming_only_message: Video streaming only available over Wi-Fi. Go to your mobile data usage settings to change your streaming preferences.
wifionly_disabled: Unable to change this setting until downloads complete.
xbox_store_support_request: Sorry to hear that. We would appreciate any feedback you might have. Please email us at support@disneyplus.com.
zero_auth_eu_copy: If you live in the EU and want to watch Disney+ when visiting another EU country, we'll need to verify your country of residence. Please enter your card details for this purpose.
zero_auth_pending_charge: You might see a pending charge on your card. It's purely to verify your account and will be reimbursed. We will store your country of residence but we will not store any of the other details provided.
